title: Alterna Bamboo Volume Plumping Strand Expand Unisex Lotion, 4 Ounce
description: This product meets our natural beauty standards with a high concentration of quality natural botanicals while keeping harsh chemicals to a minimum.                    BAMBOO Volume Plumping Strand Expand combines strengthening pure organic Bamboo Extract and stimulating, phyto-nutrient rich organic Maca Root in lightweight lotion that instantly plumps every strand. Because great hair should be sustainable.    Benefits:  Infuses hair with weightless moisture and vital nutrients.  Increases the diameter of the hair shaft.  Makes hair immediately lookand feel thicker from root to tip.  Protects color with Color Hold technology.  Contains eco-certified ingredients grown responsibly and ethically traded. FREE OF sulfates, sodium chloride, parabens, gluten, TEA, phthalates.

title: RODIN olio lusso - Luxury Face Oil - 1 oz
description: Indulge your skin in Rodin Face Oil, an amazing blend of oils that work wonders on the skin. Jasmine, almond, jojoba and evening primrose oils bring extreme comfort to the mind and skin, soothing irritations, improving elasticity and leaving the skin supple and soft. Rose hip seed, neroli and argan oils, rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids, fend off premature aging, even skin tone and aid in regenerating the skin. These oils combine to illuminate your complexion, creating a healthy appearance and feel, without leaving a greasy feeling behind.

title: TNS Essential Serum - 28.4g/1oz
description: This dual-chamber serum features two active formulas that work synergistically to maintain the skin's youthful look and feel. The first chamber features the TNS Recovery Complex, a blend of proteins, antioxidants and amino acids that repairs damage, reduces inflammation and improves visible signs of aging. The second chamber features the APS Corrective Complex, a mixture of multiple anti-aging ingredients such as antioxidants, peptides and more. These two formulas regenerate the skin by smoothing fine lines and wrinkles, tightening sagging skin, strengthening the skin's regenerative abilities, brightening age spots and fighting environmental damage. The complexion becomes youthful in both tone and texture, as well as brilliantly radiant and healthy-looking. * If you like TNS Recovery Complex, you'll love TNS Essential Serum.
